pages.body:
# Welcome to ZeroNet

[[ZeroWiki]] is a wiki platform for [[ZeroNet]], the distributed web network based on [[Bittorrent]], [[Bitcoin]] and [[Tor]]. 

[[ZeroWiki]] is public, [[cloning|clonable]]. Wikis can be used for taking notes, storing snippets, sharing knowledge by creating [[FAQ]]s and documentations, keeping track of your goals, or as simple to-do lists. See the [[help|help page]] for a more in-depth view of how it works. ZeroWiki solves the huge problem which wikipedia has, namely, that wikipedia is controlled by deletion-trolls and brainwashed scum admins.

## Useful pages

- [[zeronet|What is ZeroNet?]]
- [[zite|What is a "Zite"?]]
- [[zearch|Search engine]] 
- [[List of Zites]]
- [[hubs|List of ZeroMe Hubs]]
- [[proxies|List of proxies, allowing you to view ZeroNet from clearnet]]
- [[blocklists|Zeronet Blocklists]] 
- [[zerome|What is ZeroMe?]]
- [[ZeroWiki:Format|ZeroWiki writing format]]
- [[Dev ideas|Development ideas]]
- [[zerowikisandbox|Sandbox, you can play with it before editing other pages]]
- [[devresources|List of resources for ZeroNet and Zite development]]
- [[wallofshame|The Copyright Wall of Shame Community Edition]]
- [[copytrollquotes|A Collection of Quotes by Copyright Trolls]]

## Useful wikis
 - [New ZeroWiki](/1LX2wiouHctuUXtu5WkVM9TJJ3YoL6gAfm/) - Clone of ZeroWiki with more information and better organization.
 - [ZeroTuto, learning resources and tutorials related to ZeroNet](/1Jtjb5CU9aod4jtz8hF5NPPqFKofRSsb4x/)
  
*Please note that [[ZeroWiki]] is still beta software, it may have bugs and lack some features
[[ZeroWiki:Issues|Propose features and report bugs here]].*  
  

---

# Welcome to ZeroNet

[[ZeroWiki]] is a wiki platform for [[ZeroNet]], the distributed web network based on [[Bittorrent]], [[Bitcoin]] and [[Tor]]. 

[[ZeroWiki]] is public, [[cloning|clonable]]. Wikis can be used for taking notes, storing snippets, sharing knowledge by creating [[FAQ]]s and documentations, keeping track of your goals, or as simple to-do lists. See the [[help|help page]] for a more in-depth view of how it works. ZeroWiki solves the huge problem which wikipedia has, namely, that wikipedia is controlled by deletion-trolls and brainwashed scum admins.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
EDIT: If you want to browse ZeroNet safety especially the Chan(0chan, 08chan, etc) boards you will need Tor or a VPN.

Tor Method:
1. Download Tor Project
https://www.torproject.org/download/
2. Open it, go to "Tools" then "Options"
3. Once in Options scroll down to "Network Proxy" click on settings.
4. On the Connection Settings page, go to "No Proxy for" and copy and paste 127.0.0.1 then hit okay.
5. You can now copy your ZeroNet Bookmarks from your browser to Tor and take advantage of ZeroNets Tor fully.

OR

VPN Method:
1.Get a paid VPN that's outside the 14 eyes jurisdiction
2. Make sure the VPN has a strict no logs policy, no DNS leaks and an Internet Kill Switch.
3. On your VPNs settings enable the Kill switch to prevent internet traffic from leaking incase your internet drops.
https://thebestvpn.com/
https://thebestvpn.com/5-9-14-eyes-countries/
https://www.my-private-network.co.uk/vpn-provider-14-eyes-country-something-know/
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 - [ZeroTuto, learning resources and tutorials related to ZeroNet](/1Jtjb5CU9aod4jtz8hF5NPPqFKofRSsb4x/)
  
*Please note that [[ZeroWiki]] is still beta software, it may have bugs and lack some features
[[ZeroWiki:Issues|Propose features and report bugs here]].*
